conversion_verification.notes: The conversion represents a valid 3D isometric cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and depth. Cutaway treatment is clean, though some exterior walls are rendered as full height which slightly obscures the internal kitchen view from this angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration matches the floor plan reasonably well. However, the 3D model adds 'double decker' balconies on the left and a series of windows that imply a multi-story building rather than a single unit visualization.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is consistent with the blueprint. Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are identifiable.

visual_clarity.notes: Generally high quality, but text labels are baked into the floor texture (deduction) and some lighting is overly bright in the kitchen area.

detected_errors.description: The 3D model suggests a stacked apartment building (double balconies) rather than a faithful 3D extrusion of just the provided floor plan.
Legibility issues with text artifacts on the floor texture.

summary: A high-quality 3D transformation that preserves layout logic but introduces exterior vertical elements not present in the original 2D plan.
